name: TCL 55" S5 Class 4K UHD HDR Smart Fire TV (55S551F)
audio: Dolby Atmos, DTS Virtual:X, Enhanced Dialogue Mode
pros: Supports all major HDR formats including Dolby Vision
Integrated Fire TV platform is user-friendly and feature-rich
Good gaming features with VRR and ALLM for the price
cons: LED backlighting may not match the contrast of QLED/OLED TVs
60Hz native refresh rate (Motion Rate 240 is processed)
Audio quality from built-in speakers is basic despite software enhancements
